detectors.description: Turtles.random(uint256) (contracts/Turtles.sol#264-272) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(tx.origin,blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1),block.timestamp,block.difficulty,_input))) (contracts/Turtles.sol#265-271)
